website_summaries.verdict: The BenQ HT1085ST home entertainment projector delivers near-excellent video quality, 3D, and a short-throw lens that lets you show a big image even in a small room.
pros: Two HDMI connectors, one of which has Mobile High-Definition Link (MHL)

customer_reviews.title: Amaizing!
customer_reviews.text: AMAIZING home projector. I purchased this projector to create a cinema room in a basement and it is perfect for the job. I have a 3.5M screen of excellent image quality and the ST aspect means the Kids can still play Wii, etc without any shadows on the screen. My only recommendations would be to make sure you have a good HD feed as standard definition is obviously a bit grainy on larger screens, and the projection wall / screen is also good. I personally opted for a "smartsufraces projection wall paint" which works great, but to be fair, the picture was still amazing on some old dirty magnolia which was originally on the wall!
customer_reviews.author: Jimbob81

customer_reviews.title: We have been very happy with it until the bulb needed to be changed
customer_reviews.text: We bought the projector 3 years ago (with a 2 years guaranty). We have been very happy with it until the bulb needed to be changed. The bulb costs us approx. £200. Unfortunately the projector would not work again once the new bulb has been put in place. So we had to send it to be repaired by the manufacturer. Cost of repairs (as obviously is not under guarantee) £300. So think twice before buying this projector.
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie Titterton

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Always good product just it's need cornerston eor better keystone option.
customer_reviews.author: Baris Oktem

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Projector. Must check projection distance to screen before buying though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am lving in my own dream with BenQ W1080st+
customer_reviews.text: Ahhh, why I didn't bought this earlier. I was like in hangover for day in using this. I took day off to keep viewing videos, movies, etc... This is perfectly what it says. Real value for money. On top of image quality, it got impressive sound quality, which I never expected. It just 2 days as of now, but I am still in dream, can come out of my room. It got amazing picture quality, sound quality, easy to setup and what else you need. I will strongly recomend this. Thanks to seller for quick responses for my queries and delivery was really quick.
customer_reviews.author: Vishal Bhadauria

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic buy, amazing quality picture
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic buy ,amazing quality picture , extremely quiet , , does an excellent job in my cinema room .
customer_reviews.author: amanda coates

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Very reliable. Good sound. With very little fan noise. Can see some light shadow when you use keystone on very dark scenes. But keystone itself is very impressive. I have my projector at side of room at an angle but I can still get a square image.
customer_reviews.author: Giles Triffitt

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I had researched for more than a year and I was between W1070ST+ and W1080ST+. I ended up buying this one as the short throw capability is much better. I project it to a white wall and I can say that the view is great. I am sure it would be better on a projector screen or etc.
customer_reviews.author: Emre

customer_reviews.title: Really good projector. Need short throw and get 100 inch ...
customer_reviews.text: Really good projector. Need short throw and get 100 inch screen from 2 meters away. I did have a problem with a fan not working after a few months, but it got fixed for free within a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Mr S.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! Movie and game night will never be the same again!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up, extremely large picture at very close distances from the screen/ wall you are using. Remember this is essentially the same as the W1070+ but this has the short throw lens. If you have the luxury of space and need to save money, then you can just get the W1070+ but it will need to be further away to produce the same kind of size. I'm going to use this with a 120" motorised projector screen and it will only need to be 2m away from the screen to produce this size of image!
customer_reviews.author: Toby

customer_reviews.title: Great short throw projector
customer_reviews.text: Great quality images, amazing short throw, hooked it up to my PS4 and nvidia shield, both films and games on this are truly immersive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of kit. Ideal for small rooms , full hd , 3d but need 144hz glasses . Built in speaker is ok but recommend surround system
customer_reviews.author: monkeyboy

customer_reviews.title: upgrade from slides to digital
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted, I have a 35 mm projector for my slides. I got this for my digital snaps. It is a short throw, so handy for my house. It is worth thinking about where you are going to use it. It can be used for rear projection or from the ceiling. The picture excellent (using the HDMI port).I got this HDMI cable, to connect my laptop to the projector. I used a "35 mm projector stand" with the laptop 2 meters away. With no noticable drop in quality, so handy, for when the laptop is further away.
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.title: Very good....
customer_reviews.text: None of the previous reviews are relevant to this product. Its excellent product - but theres no vertical or horizontal lens shift - and keystone correction provides an alternative although not fully convinced this is the complete answer to projector placement. Need to get the benq wireless to help with the above and see if this helps.
customer_reviews.author: J H farooqi

customer_reviews.title: Very short throw, could be brighter. Good connectivity.
customer_reviews.text: Very short throw. I thought I could use it from across the room (3.5m), but the picture gets too large and dim then. Adjusting the optical zoom does not help much. Also, the picture correction for sideways positioning is digital, so you lose resolution. I like the powered USB port, handy for connecting a fire TV stick.
customer_reviews.author: Fred
